definition[0]: the fourth letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the second note in the musical scale of C major or the musical key based on this note
definition[2]: a mark given to a student’s work to show that it is not very good
example[0]: I got a D in history last semester.
definition[3]: the number 500 in the system of roman numerals
definition[4]: the written abbreviation of penny or pence in the system of money used in Britain before 1971
example[2]: D'you know how many people are going to be there?
